author: Scott Beale
title: Hi Stranger, An Intimate, Oddly Soothing Yet Somewhat Uncomfortable Claymation Video
text:
“Hi Stranger” , an intimate, oddly soothing yet somewhat uncomfortable claymation video written, directed, and animated by Kirsten Lepore .
via The World’s Best Ever
